address: Address must be a string and is required.
name: Name must be a string and is required.
description: Description must be a string and is required.
category: Category must be a valid Mongo ID.
creatives: Creatives must be an array of valid Mongo IDs.
functions: Functions must be an array of objects with name and unitPrice.
tools: Tools must be an array of objects with name and unitPrice.
location: Location must be an object with valid latitude and longitude.
searchKeywords: Search keywords must be an array of strings with at least 3 characters.
insurance: Insurance must be a non-negative float.
showOnHome: Show on home must be a boolean.
projectScale: Project scale must be an object with unit, minimum, maximum, and pricePerUnit.
subCategoryId: SubCategory ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
tagsId: Tags ID must be an array of valid Mongo IDs.
projectId: Project ID must be a valid Mongo ID.
startDate: Start date must be a valid ISO8601 date.
endDate: End date must be a valid ISO8601 date.
limit: Limit must be an integer greater than 0.
page: Page must be an integer greater than 0.
